column4: I don't know enough to help you with resizing, but I can say it's dangerous, so if you can backup your windows stuff on a network, or to an external drive or something... ?
ohfuck.. is it really dangerous even if i just make another partition on ~3gb?
don't let me panic you, I'm clueless.  I just know that I try to avoid resizing partitions with important data on them.
chkdsk have saved me many times to ;P
